name: Piggy, the Apples and the Guard
name_original: Piggy, the Apples and the Guard
description:
Piggy, the Apples and the Guard

Eat as many apples as you can before the guard catches you. Let's see how big you can become.

Use arrow keys to move around.

Disclaimer: It is a test project, I am learning Godot :)

Code: https://github.com/fguillen/PiggyTheApplesAndTheGuard

Credits: https://github.com/fguillen/PiggyTheApplesAndTheGuard#credits
